    | text      = I lost family in Cleveland when the bomb went off.

    | text      = Shut up.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Arrest my neighbor.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:51.840

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:53.119
    | text      = I want to join.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:54.519

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = What do I do for America?

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = You get out there and you report anybody that gives us a problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:05.159

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:06.159
    | text      = You want to be the manager of it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:08.159
    | text      = Sure.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:10.159

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:17.800

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:22.760
    | text      = It's all over, folks.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:24.760
    | text      = It's all over.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:33.039

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:39.280
    | text      = Instead, you got to do that two man, two man, two minute act out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:43.679
    | text      = Whether it is nobler in the mind to suffer the slings and arrows of outrageous misfortune,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = my friend.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:49.039

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:50.039

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:51.039
    | text      = I kept thinking.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:52.039
    | text      = It's a dream.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:53.039
    | text      = I kept thinking.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I don't know if I can think of an improv character that somebody's created to play with themselves

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:23.880

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:26.559

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:30.000
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I want to take over my neighbor's business.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:32.000
    | text      = That is true.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's difficult.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Right.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:36.920

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:37.920
    | text      = Yes, there is that.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:39.559

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:41.880
    | text      = Yeah, that was tough.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = That was bizarre.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:48.320
    | text      = I'm not sure there are many instances that I can recall of Alex doing multiple characters

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So Alex does get to calls.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:00.320
    | text      = And a good bit of this show is calls.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:02.480
    | text      = And this first guy, he asks a question about a story that you can very clearly tell Alex

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:08.559
    | text      = knows nothing about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:09.719

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:22.400

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:24.679
    | text      = Well, the guy was found dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:28.440
    | text      = And Paul Harvey said that they're saying now, he didn't go into any detail, he just said

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:33.559
    | text      = that they're saying now that it was a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:37.559
    | text      = Yeah, and you know, it's funny with the Dr. David Kelly situation, they just calmly report

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:44.119
    | text      = that, oh yeah, it's suicide, despite the fact that everything points against suicide.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:50.519
    | text      = There's a story about Colin McMillan, who's a man who Bush had nominated to be Secretary
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:55.000
    | text      = of the Navy, who died by suicide while waiting for his confirmation by the Senate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:00.000
    | text      = People who knew him commented that he had a recurrence of a cancer that he'd been struggling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:07.519
    | text      = in his death.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:08.519
    | text      = Right, right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:09.519

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:12.760

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:15.880
    | text      = He's supposed to know everything, so when this caller brings up a Navy Secretary nominee

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:31.320
    | text      = Of course.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
